ygData.subject: RE: Planes, here I come...
ygData.msgSnippet: All of the GM s on my server have acknowledged that spite golems (and pets) are bugged. These are the single largest problem to overcome when making the zone
ygData.messageBody:
All of the GM's on my server have acknowledged that spite golems (and pets)
are bugged.
These are the single largest problem to overcome when making the zone
"safe".
Generally, if we kill any spite golem, and haven't seen the pet, everyone
immediately camps out afterwards to clear the aggro list.
I'm sure they'll get around to fixing this in a few months.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard, Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Sunday, January 02, 2000 10:51 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Planes, here I come...


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

same here. a few weeks ago the consensus was to stop playing songs when
pulling, but i was in hate for 15 hours last week (finally killed Inno for
first time on our server) and i specifically asked if i needed to worry
about playing songs during pulls. everyone said no. i was not in the
pullers group, as you said. the one thing that trained us badly was a stuck
golem pet, kept aggro'ing all kinds of stuff. if you see a golem come with
no pet, not good. finally got arms though, which suck compared to mithril
but full imbrued looks pretty cool.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L34 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
